com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
Class WebViewer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.VisibleComponent
      com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidViewComponent
          com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.WebViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public final class WebViewer
extends AndroidViewComponent

Component for displaying web pages This is a very limited form of browser. You can view web pages and click on links. It also handles Javascript. There are lots of things that could be added, but this component is mostly for viewing individual pages. It's not intended to take the place of the browser.

Author:
halabelson@google.com (Hal Abelson)
